com.sri.ai.grinder.sgdpllt.theory.base

Class AbstractSelectionStepSolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sri.ai.grinder.sgdpllt.theory.base.AbstractLinearStepSolver<T>
      • com.sri.ai.grinder.sgdpllt.theory.base.AbstractExpressionsSequenceStepSolver<java.util.List<Expression>>
        • com.sri.ai.grinder.sgdpllt.theory.base.AbstractSelectionStepSolver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StepSolver<java.util.List<Expression>>, java.lang.Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SelectExpressionsSatisfyingComparisonStepSolver

    @Beta
public abstract class AbstractSelectionStepSolver
extends AbstractExpressionsSequenceStepSolver<java.util.List<Expression>>
    A context-dependent problem step solver taking a list of expressions e1,...,e_n and computing the sub-list e_{j_1},...,e_{j_m} such that all e_i is in the sub-list if and only if the result of invoking AbstractExpressionsSequenceStepSolver.makeLiteralBasedOn(Expression) on e_i is true in the context.
    Author:
    braz
